entry.title: Video editing and logo presentation - Upwork
entry.summary:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can help with video editing to create 1 as product video and 1 for father's day marketing video, and a logo presentation for a project lasting less than a month. The ideal candidate will have experience in audio editing, music video production, and video production.
(Video and details will be provided to successful candidates)

We need someone who can create a visually appealing video by editing existing footage and adding music and sound effects. Additionally, the candidate should be able to incorporate our company logo into the video and present it in a creative way.

The candidate should be able to work independently and follow instructions effectively. We expect a high-quality finished product that meets our expectations and requirements.

If you are interested in this project, please submit a proposal describing how you can help us achieve our goals. Please include links to your past completed projects that showcase your video editing and logo presentation skills. We look forward to hearing from you!

Note: Some of the content in this job post may have been auto-generated using advanced AI.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 03, 2023 14:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Music Video, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Singapore
click to apply

entry.title: Video Editor for Reels - Upwork
entry.summary:
I am looking for someone to partner with long term to help me create reels for IG and TT to promote my podcast. Typically I work off of 1-2 video recordings, depending on whether or not the podcast was filmed in person. I am open to full service edits (e.g. add Captions, Emojis, Color Grading, Cut Out Dead Air, Motion Graphics to your videos.), but I primarily need someone to splice and compile the videos as I have my own caption services and music service I can use to finalize the video. The main thing I am looking for is volume. I am hoping to get anywhere from 5-8+ videos/per pod. I am looking for someone who finds this interesting and is open to working in packages/creating reels in bulk.

Here is a link to my podcast: https://redefiningrelationship.buzzsprout.com
Here is a link to my IG to view the reels I currently create: https://www.instagram.com/herewebecome/

**Important some of the files, even when compressed are large. You will need to have good internet access to download and edit**


Posted On: June 03, 2023 14:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing, Podcast
Country: United States
click to apply

entry.title: We are looking for skilled video editors to work on a 1-3 month project. - Upwork
entry.summary:
The project is fully remote, so you can work from anywhere in the world. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in video editing and be proficient in 360-Degree Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Content Writing, Maxon Cinema 4D, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, and Video Production.

As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos that meet the client's requirements. You will work closely with our team to ensure that the videos are delivered on time and to the highest standards. We are looking for someone who is creative, detail-oriented, and has excellent communication skills.

entry.title: Looking for creative video editor for a Economic niche - Upwork
entry.summary:
I run a YouTube channel that focuses on exploring the Economies of nations. We're looking for a creative video editor to help with making the videos in the Economy space. You must be able to create interesting and engaging content. It is required that you are familiar with the space because you will need to react to trending topics and videos in the space.

Below is some sample channel in the space

https://youtube.com/@h0ser
https://youtube.com/@economicsexplainedessentia551
https://youtube.com/@EconomicsExplained
https://youtube.com/@RealLifeLore
https://youtu.be/VDlETESajIc
https://youtu.be/Rk2HYRGzT8Q
https://youtube.com/@GrahamStephan
https://youtube.com/@PeterSchiffChannel
https://youtube.com/@CasualScholar


Also, we prefer to know who we're working with (especially since we're looking for someone to work with long-term), so you must be willing to get on a Zoom call with me before we get started. It's also a bonus if you are familiar with YouTube SEO and of course the YouTube policies so we don't get copyright claims.

P.S
When sending your proposal, add "YES" to the top letting me know that you actually read the whole job post and understand the requirements (I'm aware some people don't read the jobs post and just copy and paste a script as their proposal).

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 03, 2023 14:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

entry.title: Video editor for Nba Basketball Youtube channel (Long Term position) - Upwork
entry.summary:
We are looking for someone to be apart of our team long-term for our NBA Basketball YouTube channel project.

The ideal candidate should have basic knowledge in the following:
- editing youtube
- repurposing long form videos
- capacity of selecting clips from references
- ability to avoid copyright autonomously

To see examples, visit:
- https://www.youtube.com/@HoopFlix
- https://www.youtube.com/@nonstop/videos
- https://www.youtube.com/@mvp81/videos

If your reading this job proposal please insert the name of your favourite Nba player.

Production is 2-4 videos a week.

Please include in your description the URL OF YOUTUBE VIDEOS YOU WORKED ON.

It's required owning a large library of NBA clips and having deep passion and knowledge for NBA universe.

Contract Salary: 3$ per minute.

The project includes creating specific players and topic-related analysis. This is a more than 6-month position, so we are looking for someone who is committed and passionate about the project.

Hope to enjoy our team soon!


Budget: $30
Posted On: June 03, 2023 12:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, YouTube
Country: Italy

entry.title: Looking for a youtube video editor partner - Upwork
entry.summary:
We are looking to hire a talented and experienced video editor to join our team on Upwork. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our YouTube channel's video content to captivate and engage our audience. This is an exciting opportunity to work with a growing YouTube channel and contribute to its success.

Responsibilities:

Edit and enhance raw footage into compelling and high-quality videos for our YouTube channel.
Incorporate graphics, animations, and effects to enhance the visual appeal of the videos.
Ensure smooth transitions, audio synchronization, and seamless editing throughout the videos.
Collaborate with the content creators to understand their vision and requirements for each video.
Trim and cut video segments to improve pacing and maintain viewer interest.
Add relevant music, sound effects, and voice-overs to enhance the overall video experience.
Stay up-to-date with the latest video editing techniques, tools, and trends.
Requirements:

Proven work experience as a video editor, preferably with experience in editing YouTube content.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
Strong understanding of video editing techniques, such as color grading, audio mixing, and motion graphics.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and storytelling.
Ability to work independently, meet deadlines, and collaborate effectively with content creators.
Strong communication skills to discuss and implement feedback from the team.
A portfolio or sample work showcasing your video editing skills.
Compensation:

The pay for this position will range from 5 to 30 dollars per video, depending on experience and skill level.
Additionally, you will receive 10% of the channel's revenue generated from the videos you edit, providing an opportunity for additional earnings based on the channel's success.
If you are a skilled video editor who is passionate about creating visually appealing and engaging content for YouTube, we would love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio or sample work along with your application. We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially working together to take our YouTube channel to new heights.




Here are analytics and links to some of m other channels

https://docs.google.com/document/d/12H1HYevNE331D4ErVWYnIHSwrQ1bV8Qh7s6mWELD4Fo/edit


Budget: $30
Posted On: June 03, 2023 11:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing, YouTube, Motion Graphics, Graphic Design
Country: Canada
click to apply

Compensation:

The pay for this position will range from 5 to 30 dollars per video, depending on experience and skill level.
Additionally, you will receive 10% of the channel's revenue generated from the videos you edit, providing an opportunity for additional earnings based on the channel's success.
If you are a skilled video editor who is passionate about creating visually appealing and engaging content for YouTube, we would love to hear from you. Please include your portfolio or sample work along with your application. We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially working together to take our YouTube channel to new heights.




Here are analytics and links to some of m other channels

https://docs.google.com/document/d/12H1HYevNE331D4ErVWYnIHSwrQ1bV8Qh7s6mWELD4Fo/edit


Budget: $30

entry.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
entry.summary:
** Long term consistent role! **

We are looking for a skilled video editor who can help us create engaging content for our Police encounter YouTube channel. As our video editor, you will be responsible for editing videos, adding subtitles, making the video engaging, and adding music to the video. An edit example is linked at the bottom.


Requirements:

- Edit footage into a full, engaging, commentary style video for our YouTube channel.
- Must have experience in video editing and be able to add English subtitles.
- Be able to make the video engaging and add suitable background music
- Must be able to work with Envato Elements subscription to source music and other necessary assets. We can not use copyrighted material.

Attach some of your previous similar work please.
Please type 'RED' at the top of your proposal if you've made it to the end

Example video edit from a competitor channel: https://youtu.be/0tHE5BCobZY

We look forward to hearing from you. Please only apply if you can match given quality or better. Thanks!


Budget: $75
Posted On: June 03, 2023 11:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
